DESCRIPTION: Dead On cards trigger an additional effect when played from the middle of your hand.
Until the end of your turn, trigger the #yDead #yOn effect of the next #yDead #yOn card you play regardless of position.
Bruised creatures receive additional attack damage until the end of your turn.
Reduce the next instance of unblocked damage taken to #b2 [REMOVE_SPACE].
Normal enemy: #b15 gold.      Elite enemy: #b40 gold.            Boss: #b100 gold.
